result.longName: Runhua Living Service Group Holdings Limited

assetProfile.address2: 6th Floor Lemeng Center No. 28988 Jingshi Road
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Runhua Living Service Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides property management, property engineering, landscape construction, property investment, and other services in the People's Republic of China. The company offers property management services, such as cleaning and disinfection, security, general repair and maintenance, customer, carpark management, canteen management, conference, elevator operations, and chauffeur services; and hospital logistics services. It also provides maintenance services for building components and systems, interior renovation services, alteration and addition work of existing buildings and facilities, and installation of elevators. In addition, the company is involved in the sale, leasing, and planting of trees, shrubs, and flowers; modification of the shape and elevation of terrain used for landscaping; instalment of related equipment; and landscape maintenance work during/after the provision of its landscape construction services. Further, it rents investment properties; offers patient nursing and post-natal caring services, as well as daily server maintenance services; and sells software supporting systems. Additionally, the company engages in the sale of elevator accessories; and provision of technological development and human resources services. Runhua Living Service Group Holdings Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jinan, the People's Republic of China.
